sn3.20:4.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo divā divassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn3.20:4.2: upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn3.20:4.3: “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja, āgacchasi divā divassā”ti?
sn3.20:5.2: Tamahaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājantepuraṃ atiharitvā āgacchāmi.
sn3.20:5.3: Sataṃ, bhante, satasahassāni hiraññasseva, ko pana vādo rūpiyassa.
sn3.20:5.4: Tassa kho pana, bhante, seṭṭhissa gahapatissa evarūpo bhattabhogo ahosi—
sn3.20:6.2: Bhūtapubbaṃ so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi gahapati taggarasikhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭipādesi.
sn3.20:6.4: Datvā ca pana pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi:
sn3.20:6.5: ‘varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyun’ti.
sn3.20:6.6: Bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesi.
sn3.20:7.1: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi gahapati taggarasikhiṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭipādesi, tassa kammassa vipākena sattakkhattuṃ sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajji.
sn3.20:7.2: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imissāyeva sāvatthiyā sattakkhattuṃ seṭṭhittaṃ kāresi.
sn3.20:7.3: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi gahapati datvā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi:
sn3.20:7.4: ‘varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyun’ti, tassa kammassa vipākena nāssuḷārāya bhattabhogāya cittaṃ namati, nāssuḷārāya vatthabhogāya cittaṃ namati, nāssuḷārāya yānabhogāya cittaṃ namati, nāssuḷārānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ bhogāya cittaṃ namati.
sn3.20:7.5: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi gahapati bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesi, tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccittha.
sn3.20:7.6: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idaṃ sattamaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājakosaṃ paveseti.
sn3.20:7.7: Tassa kho, mahārāja, seṭṭhissa gahapatissa purāṇañca puññaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ, navañca puññaṃ anupacitaṃ.
sn3.20:7.8: Ajja pana, mahārāja, seṭṭhi gahapati mahāroruve niraye paccatī”ti.
sn3.20:7.9: “Evaṃ, bhante, seṭṭhi gahapati mahāroruvaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno”ti.
sn3.20:7.10: “Evaṃ, mahārāja, seṭṭhi gahapati mahāroruvaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno”ti.

sn3.20:13.4: Mallikā dve appamādena ca;
